suggestions.text: Brake pad wear is common. I recommend checking pad thickness and rotor condition.
suggestions.label: Brake Pad Check

suggestions.text: Could be brake fluid issue. When was your last brake fluid change?
suggestions.label: Brake Fluid

suggestions.text: Engine noises can indicate timing chain, valve train, or bearing issues. Can you describe when the noise occurs?
suggestions.label: Engine Diagnosis

suggestions.text: Transmission issues require fluid level check and scan for error codes. Do you feel any vibration?
suggestions.label: Transmission Check

suggestions.text: I'll need to run a diagnostic scan to read the error codes. This will identify the specific issue.
suggestions.label: Diagnostic Scan

suggestions.text: Oil leaks need immediate attention. Can you take a photo of where you see the leak under the vehicle?
suggestions.label: Oil Leak Photo Request
